publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2020 Michael Russell: Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998—That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose the establishment of a special committee to consider any amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 proposed by Her Majesty’s Government or any Westminster MP and to report on such amendments to the Scottish Parliament prior to such amendments being debated at Westminster, in order that the views of the Scottish Parliament on these matters can be expressed to Westminster.
S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-2020 Michael Russell: Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998—That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose the establishment of a special committee to consider any amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 proposed by Her Majesty’s Government or any Westminster MP and to report on such amendments to the Scottish Parliament prior to such amendments being debated at Westminster, in order that the views of the Scottish Parliament on these matters can be expressed to Westminster. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Colin Campbell*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Shona Robison*

S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Brian Adam*, Irene McGugan*, Kay Ullrich*, Christine Grahame*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Janis Hughes*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2020 Committee to examine amendments to the Scotland Act 1998 (lodged on 19 June 2001) Dennis Canavan*
